TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataBinding extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含有关 ASP.NET 服务器控件中的单个数据绑定表达式的信息，这些信息可让快速应用程序开发 (RAD) 设计器（如 Microsoft Visual Studio）能够在设计时创建数据绑定表达式。

span.span: Contains information about a single data-binding expression in an ASP.NET server control, which allows rapid-application development (RAD) designers, such as Microsoft Visual Studio, to create data-binding expressions at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务器控件中的每个数据绑定表达式在设计时由类的实例表示。Each data-binding expression in a server control is represented at design time by an instance of the class. 包含一个或多个数据绑定表达式的任何服务器控件都有一个包含对象的对象。Any server control that contains one or more data-binding expressions has a object that contains the objects. 可以通过 实现接口的类来访问此集合。This collection is accessible through the class implementing the interface. 创建自定义 RAD 设计器时, 请使用该实现访问该集合。When you create a custom RAD designer, use that implementation to access the collection. 与服务器控件关联的任何或对象只存在于设计时。Any or objects associated with a server control exist only at design time. 它们在运行时不存在, 因此在运行时无法访问。They do not exist at run time and, therefore, are not accessible during run time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个对象, 并将其设置为与控件的集合中具有`propertyName`值的`Text`参数相同的现有对象。The following code example creates a object and sets it equal to an existing object in the control's collection that has a `propertyName` parameter with a value of `Text`. 如果集合包含一个`propertyName`值为的`Text`对象, 则此代码将返回对象的属性的值。If the collection contains a object with a `propertyName` value of `Text`, this code returns the value of the object's property. 如果没有此类对象, 则返回一个空字符串 ("")。If there is no such object, it returns an empty string (""). [!code-csharp[DataBinding_Sample1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataBinding_Sample1/CS/databinding_samp1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DataBinding_Sample1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataBinding_Sample1/VB/databinding_samp1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个对象, 并将其设置为与控件的集合中具有`propertyName`值的`Text`参数相同的现有对象。The following code example creates a object and sets it equal to an existing object in the control's collection that has a `propertyName` parameter with a value of `Text`. 如果集合包含一个`propertyName`值为的`Text`对象, 则此代码将返回对象的属性的值。If the collection contains a object with a `propertyName` value of `Text`, this code returns the value of the object's property. 如果没有此类对象, 则返回一个空字符串 ("")。If there is no such object, it returns an empty string (""). summary.span: 检索 对象的实例的哈希代码。

span.span: Retrieves the hash code for an instance of the object.

returns.span: 32 位有符号整数哈希代码。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象位于对象中, 只能在设计时访问。 objects are placed in a object, accessible only at design time. 集合是表示控件上的绑定的哈希表。The collection is a hash table that represents the bindings on a control. 每个属性只能有一个绑定, 因此哈希代码计算与实现匹配, 只考虑属性名称。There can only be one binding per property, so the hash code computation matches the implementation and only takes the property name into account.

summary.span: 获取要将数据绑定到的 ASP.NET 服务器控件属性的名称。

The property to bind data to.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例声明了三个`dataBindingOutput1`变量`dataBindingOutput2`:、 `dataBindingOutput3`和 , 它们`myDataBinding2`访问对象的不同属性。The following code example declares three variables, `dataBindingOutput1`, `dataBindingOutput2`, and `dataBindingOutput3`, which access the different properties of a object, `myDataBinding2`. 然后, 它将属性的值分配给, 将该属性的值连接到`dataBindingOutput1`字符串 "属性名称是", 并将值写入文件。It then assigns the value of the property to `dataBindingOutput1`, concatenates it with the string "The property name is ", and writes the value to a file. [!code-csharp[DataBinding_Sample1#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataBinding_Sample1/CS/databinding_samp1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[DataBinding_Sample1#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataBinding_Sample1/VB/databinding_samp1.vb#6)]
